Initial Commit
Initial Commit

Add RedmineService and update MainWindow layout
Implemented RedmineService to fetch issues from the Redmine API and registered it with the dependency injection container. Also modified MainWindow layout to include a ComboBox and a Button for user interaction. These changes set up the basic functionality for the Redmine auto logging application.

Update RedmineService and IRedmineService methods
Refactored the GetMyIssuesAsync method to remove userApiKey as a parameter and implemented a new method, AddLogTimeToIssueAsync, to add log times to an issue. The IRedmineService interface was updated to accommodate these changes. The UserApiKey was also moved to the appsettings.json file for easier and safer management.

Update MainWindow.xaml layout and .idea/workspace.xml
Modified the layout structure for MainWindow.xaml by adding Border and Grid settings. Additionally, the .idea/workspace.xml file has been updated to reflect the changes in task management and various configuration settings.

Add UI for logging time and update IRedmineService methods
The MainWindow UI has been updated with a text box for comments and a ComboBox for activity types. IRedmineService methods have been updated to support comments and activity type selection when logging time. The RedmineActivity enum was also created to facilitate activity type selection.

Updated UI layout and added user settings feature
Refactored the UI layout in MainWindow.xaml for better readability and user experience. A new feature that reads and writes user settings in a JSON file was introduced, allowing users to save their API keys and issue activity comments. The service that handles the functionality was also created and included in dependency injection.

Update MainViewModel and project files
MainViewModel was updated to include configurations for IRedmineService and IUserSettingService. Project files were also updated to handle additional functionalities and streamline the task management process. Various .xml settings were tweaked to improve project performance. Lastly, LangVersion was set to 'default' in the RedmineAutoLogTime.csproj file.

Refactor UserSettingService and update UserSettings model
UserSettingService has been simplified with the methods SaveApiKey and SaveIssueActivityComment replaced by a universal SaveUserSettings. LoadUserSettings has also been updated to safely load user settings with exception handling. Changes were made in the UserSettings model to align with the updated service, with some properties such as IssueId replaced by an Issue object and additional JSON property naming attributes.

Refactor MainWindow.xaml and update MainViewModel
MainWindow.xaml has been refactored for better readability and user experience. The MainViewModel file has been updated to simplify the management of activities.

Add log time tracking and fetching functionality
Added functionality to track and fetch log times in Redmine, specifically for the current day. This involved creating new models for User and LogTime, and enhancing the IRedmineService interface and RedmineService class to support fetching of today's log times. A new async test command was also added to MainViewModel.

Implement background service for log time tracking
A background service for log time tracking has been implemented in an app, replacing the previous manual service collection setup. The application startup process has been revised accordingly. In addition, new dependencies to support this feature have been added to the project.

Enable data context binding and enhance user settings and log time addition
This update includes binding the "ViewModelLocator" to the MainWindow data context in the MainWindow.xaml file. In the UserSettingService.cs file, JSON serialization options have been added to format the user settings updates. The CheckLogWorker.cs file now includes new functionalities to enhance the log time addition based on the

Add system tray service and app icon
SystemTrayService was added in the services to handle system tray icon and actions. Additionally, an application icon graphics "app.ico" has been added to the project and set as the application icon. The service is initialized at application startup and displays the tray icon with a context menu.

Update window closing behavior and refactor system tray service
The MainWindow now only hides, instead of fully closing. This change was implemented to enable interaction through system tray. Refactored SystemTrayService to improve maintainability and simplicity. Added the ability for the user to exit the application from the system tray.

Update character encoding and increase delay in CheckLogWorker
Replaced special characters with their corresponding HTML entities in workspace.xml for better compatibility across different systems. Also, increased the delay time from 1 minute to 10 minutes in CheckLogWorker.cs for better system performance.

Replace ComboBox with TextBoxes in MainWindow.xaml and update UserSettings fields
The ComboBox in MainWindow.xaml has been replaced by two TextBoxes to display IssueSubject and IssueId. The UserSetting fields have been updated accordingly to store and retrieve these two properties. Additional properties have been added in MainViewModel.cs. Lastly, the save and connect functions now operate on these updated fields.

Added handling of IssueId text change and fetching of corresponding issue
Implemented a handler for when the IssueId text field changes in MainWindow. When a change is detected, an HTTP request is sent to fetch the issue data corresponding to the entered issue ID. Also, additional modifications were done to support this functionality by adjusting the RedmineService.cs and corresponding issue models.

Update UI alignment and refine logging functions
Modified vertical alignment of text boxes in MainWindow.xaml for better user interface. Removed redundant logging function in IRedmineService.cs and RedmineService.cs and adjusted the parameter for AddLogTimeToIssueAsync from int to string to accept issue ID as string. Essential configurations were also edited in CheckLogWorker.cs for correctly capturing the issue ID.

Add README file and update application title in MainWindow
A README.md file has been added providing detailed step-by-step guide on how to use the program. Meanwhile, changes were made to the MainWindow.xaml to update the application's title to "Redmine Auto LogTime". This makes it clearer for users what the application is for.

Update AssemblyVersion and FileVersion to 0.1.0
The AssemblyVersion and FileVersion fields have been added to the RedmineAutoLogTime csproj file and the versions have been set as 0.1.0. Additionally, some minor formatting adjustments have been made to the file.

Implement Serilog for logging application data
The Serilog logging library has been implemented in the application for logging application activities. This setup includes logging unhandled exceptions and writing logs to both the console and a file. The new functionality improves the ease of debugging and tracking issues inside the application.

Implement Serilog in RedmineAutoLogTime
This commit adds the Serilog logging library to the RedmineAutoLogTime application. Changes were made in the App.xaml.cs and to the dependencies in the csproj file to accommodate this. Additionally, the user API key was removed from the appsettings.json file due to security concerns.

Add logger to CheckLogWorker and refactor error handling
The logger has been added to the CheckLogWorker class to handle and log exceptions better. A refactoring was carried out to provide better error handling for operations that might throw exceptions, such as checking log time and adding log time to issues, improving overall stability and fault-tolerance.

Update API key retrieval in RedmineService
Changed the key used for retrieving the API key from "UserApiKey" to "apiKey" in all methods of RedmineService. This ensures consistent naming conventions and avoids confusion between different keys.

Added separate Startup project and improved app startup behavior
Created a separate Startup project that contains logic for allowing application to run at system startup. Also increased the stability and fault-tolerance of the existing RedmineAutoLogTime application. This was achieved by updating the API key retrieval in RedmineService and adding a logger to CheckLogWorker to log exceptions better.

Remove 'Startup' project and refactor startup logic
Deleted the 'Startup' project and updated the 'StartupService' within the 'RedmineAutoLogTime' application to handle the startup process. The new implementation relies on Registry manipulation to enable or disable launching the application at system startup.

Update Assembly and File versions to 0.1.1
A minor version bump was made reflecting the changes to the RedmineAutoLogTime project. Now both AssemblyVersion and AssemblyFileVersion are updated to 0.1.1.

Update base path retrieval method
Changed the method of retrieving the base path in `App.xaml.cs` from `System.Reflection.Assembly.GetExecutingAssembly().Location` to `AppDomain.CurrentDomain.BaseDirectory`. This approach is more reliable and less prone to certain exceptions.

Refactor RedmineService methods for API key testing and cleanup
Redesigned the method of testing API key and removed GetMyIssuesAsync() function from RedmineService. Also disposed unnecessary instances correctly for efficient memory usage. Optimized MainViewModel to use the updated API key testing with appropriate user prompts.
